attributes.action: To end mps expences on the grouns of imorality
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When an mp and government minister claims £11500 per annum for sharing a house more that ordinary londoners it makes the expences a free for all.
My girlfriend who lives in barking essex shares a 2 bed flat with her sister her share is £4500 £11500 less than jacui smith.
How many home owners in england are strugling to pay a mortgage of £4 to £6000 per annum so to claim £116000  is sick and imoral they choose to be mps if i took a job in london i would have to pay my own expences from my salary.
Should her and other mps not set the example.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
